segment.source: Now that you've created your first app, check out the rest of the Dev Center.
segment.target: Now that you've created your first app, check out the rest of the Dev Center.

segment.source: Here's an introduction to the different sections it contains.'
segment.target: Here's an introduction to the different sections it contains.'

segment.source: Now that you've created your first app, check out the rest of the Dev Center.
segment.target: Now that you've created your first app, check out the rest of the Dev Center.

segment.source: Here's an introduction to the different sections it contains.
segment.target: Here's an introduction to the different sections it contains.

segment.source: Make your app stand out by learning how to design a great user interface.
segment.target: Make your app stand out by learning how to design a great user interface.

segment.source: The topics in this section provide guidelines for app design, considerations for planning, case studies, graphical resources, and design templates.
segment.target: The topics in this section provide guidelines for app design, considerations for planning, case studies, graphical resources, and design templates.

segment.source: The Develop section provides detailed info and coding examples for the many of the features available to your app.
segment.target: The Develop section provides detailed info and coding examples for the many of the features available to your app.

segment.source: The Windows Store lets you reach the millions of customers who use Microsoft Windows.
segment.target: The Windows Store lets you reach the millions of customers who use Microsoft Windows.

segment.source: The Windows Store is a marketplace where you sell apps to customers practically anywhere in the world.
segment.target: The Windows Store is a marketplace where you sell apps to customers practically anywhere in the world.

segment.source: Customers find apps relevant to their country or region in a consistent way across all devices.
segment.target: Customers find apps relevant to their country or region in a consistent way across all devices.

segment.source: You choose to sell your apps in specific countries or regions, and you can specify a single price tier that prices your app in local currencies.
segment.target: You choose to sell your apps in specific countries or regions, and you can specify a single price tier that prices your app in local currencies.

segment.source: This section contains detailed info on the classes, properties, methods, events, styles, and other APIs that you can use to create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
segment.target: This section contains detailed info on the classes, properties, methods, events, styles, and other APIs that you can use to create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

segment.source: This section describes the programming languages available to you and any variations in the Universal Windows Platform (UWP) implementation of those languages.
segment.target: This section describes the programming languages available to you and any variations in the Universal Windows Platform (UWP) implementation of those languages.

segment.source: If you need help understanding and coding with the languages, this section will help you.
segment.target: If you need help understanding and coding with the languages, this section will help you.

segment.source: If you're interested in developing games using DirectX, this section provides the info you need.
segment.target: If you're interested in developing games using DirectX, this section provides the info you need.

segment.source: If you're interested in developing for the Internet of Things (IoT), this section provides the info you need.
segment.target: If you're interested in developing for the Internet of Things (IoT), this section provides the info you need.
